dogecoin.text: @Iamdaniboy1 @FuriousGeen @dogecoin_rise Be careful about who you give your information to.

@hectorisborn @Roseann59179816 @dogecoin_rise A website that lets you do it right now is AnchorUSD. They allow for trading coins directly. You can deposit Dogecoin into your Dogecoin wallet on there. Then trade it direct for Bitcoin. You can earn Bitcoin interest on there and still take out of sell your Bitcoin at any time

@hectorisborn @Roseann59179816 @dogecoin_rise So you would deposit Dogecoin into your Coinbase wallet (once Coinbase gets Dogecoin), and then trade directly into Bitcoin from Coinbase. Make sure to connect your Coinbase wallet to your Coinbase account.

@hectorisborn @Roseann59179816 @dogecoin_rise Swap it directly. Don't sell and then buy. You might get taxed. Make sure it allows you to swap it directly. If it doesn't, use an exchange that does. Coinbase will soon get Dogecoin and Coinbase wallet is good. They allow for swapping tokens directly.
